casebody.data:
State
v.
Derrick Dewayne Wallace 228P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Wallace, Derrick Dewayne. Scott T. Slusser, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2016 by *516Plaintiff for Response to Petition for Discretionary Review to be Deemed Timely Filed:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
